dmca.title: copyright violation - bullymag.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Ken Wohlrob [mailto:kwohlrob@covad.net] 
Sent: Monday, January 08, 2007 9:30 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: copyright violation - bullymag.com

To whom it may concern:

I used to own the URL http://www.bullymag.com/ which was for a magazine
I published. Now it is registered through you by an anonymous user.  I
did relinquish ownership of this URL earlier this year. However, the
person who purchased the URL through you has taken content from my
magazine in posted it as their own.  Their are infringing on copyrights
for the logo design of the magazine as well as all the published
articles they have listed on the site. In addition, the current owners
of the URL have removed my original copyright from all the listed
articles and the home page, and replaced it with links for the online
shoe stores they are promoting. I never gave the current owners of this
URL permission to use any of the copyrighted material and images listed
below. They are therefore infringing on my copyrighted material.

The list of copyrighted works that have been infringed upon are:
- The home page at www.bullymag.com including the logo at the top and
all text and links:
http://www.bullymag.com/

- The Single Theory and Other Topics: An Interview With Henry Rollins
http://www.bullymag.com/1.22.01/rollins-012201.html

- Horseshit In Journalism Award: TIME Magazine
http://www.bullymag.com/3.4.02/horseshit-030402.html

- Down:  Down II
http://www.bullymag.com/3.28.02/down-032802.html

- Cry Me A Frickin' River: Why Emo Girls Look Like Boys and Why Emo Boys
Cry Like Little Girls http://www.bullymag.com/4.18.02/emo-041802.html

- The Bully Interview: Zakk Wylde, One Monster of a Guitar Player
http://www.bullymag.com/5.11.02/zakk-051102.html

- Book 'Em: A Quiet Little Madness
http://www.bullymag.com/6.6.02/book-060802.html

- America: Land of the Fat, Drunken Slobs
http://www.bullymag.com/6.6.02/america-060802.html

- Gene Ammons & Sonny Stitt: Boss Tenors In Orbit
http://www.bullymag.com/7.12.02/bosstenors-071202.html

- Weird Product of the Month: Harry Potter's Vibrating Broom
http://www.bullymag.com/9.6.02/product-090602.html

- November 2002 Jackass: Vladimir Putin and the Russian Security Forces
http://www.bullymag.com/11.1.02/jackass.html

- December 2002 Jackass: Senator Robert C. Byrd
http://www.bullymag.com/12.1.02/jackass.html

- American Stupidity: Selling Che Guevara
http://www.bullymag.com/1.20.03/stupidity-012003.html

- The Underground Literary Alliance: Fighting The War Against Publishing
Nepotism http://www.bullymag.com/2.5.03/ula-020503.html

- The Bully Interview: Greg Palast, The Last True Outlaw Journalist
http://www.bullymag.com/4.27.03/palast-042703.html

- Blahg, Blahg, Blahg: The Times Picks Up on a Bully Story, Six Months
Late http://www.bullymag.com/6.1.03/blahg-060103.html

- Stepford Lit: The Believer magazine tries to corner "The New
Sincerity"
http://www.bullymag.com/7.20.03/believer-072003.html

- Elizabeth Spiers: Movin' On Up!
http://www.bullymag.com/9.20.03/spiers-092003.html

- Comics Fix: Richard Sala's Dark and Eccentric Evil Eye
http://www.bullymag.com/10.12.03/sala-101203.html

- Top List: Bully's "Ten Worst American Cities To Live In" List
http://www.bullymag.com/11.18.03/cities-111803.html

All the articles linked on the home page and including the home page
copy and images itself are owned by me. The most notable proof of my
claim is the fact that they've posted articles with my name in the
byline ("Ken Wohlrob"). If need be however, I can also provide you with
the original HTML/ASP files as proof of my ownership. As the owner of
this copyrighted material, I attest that everything stated above is
accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that I am authorized to act on
behalf of myself of an exclusive copyright that has been infringed.

Please have all this content removed from this site and URL immediately.

If you have any questions, you can contact me at kwohlrob@covad.net or
718-302-5454. You can also contact me via regular mail at:

Ken Wohlrob
153 Wythe Ave., 2nd Flr.
Brooklyn, NY 11211

Sincerely,
